title: COVID-19
description: Protect yourself and others by getting vaccinated against COVID-19. Find vaccination clinics in Berkeley, or book an appointment at testing site. Follow restrictions and guidance from Berkeley's Health Officer. Get guidance on face coverings, worksite exposures, and school settings. Follow isolation and quarantine protocols if you do become ill with COVID-19.
cleaned_text: COVID-19 Protect yourself and others by getting vaccinated against COVID-19. Find vaccination clinics in Berkeley, or book an appointment at testing site. Follow restrictions and guidance from Berkeley's Health Officer. Get guidance on face coverings, worksite exposures, and school settings.
